definition.title: The Strategic Offer Funnel
definition.subtitle: A well-designed offer funnel meets prospects where they are and guides them toward transformation at their own pace.
definition.content: Lead magnets capture interest with immediate value. Core offers deliver your main transformation at accessible investment. High-ticket offers provide premium, personalized experiences for committed clients.

faq.question: How is this different from the regular Offers Generator?
faq.answer: The Conversion Offer Generator focuses on building a complete tiered funnel (Lead Magnet â†’ Core Offer â†’ High-Ticket), while the regular Offers Generator creates individual service packages. This tool helps you create a strategic pathway from free to premium.

faq.question: What if I only need one type of offer?
faq.answer: You can generate and lock just the tiers you need. The tool works for creating individual offers or a complete funnel.

faq.question: Can I refine the generated offers?
faq.answer: Yes! Use the refinement box to give AI feedback like 'make it more exclusive' or 'focus on the speed of results' to iterate on your offers.

faq.question: Are the pricing suggestions binding?
faq.answer: No, pricing is suggested based on your selected price range and tier. You can adjust all details to match your actual offerings.

additionalGuidance.title: Pricing Your Tiers
additionalGuidance.content: Lead magnets should be free or ultra-low cost ($7-$27 tripwire). Core offers typically range from $500-$2,500 for most service businesses. High-ticket starts at $5,000+ and often includes personalized access to you.

additionalGuidance.title: Mentioning Offers on Podcasts
additionalGuidance.content: Lead with your free offer during podcast interviews - it's the lowest friction way to convert listeners. Mention your lead magnet URL and let your funnel do the rest.
